Post.title: Event
Flex
Post._content:
2009W3C-Flex

### Flex
FlexFlexible Box
``` css
/* Flex */
.box{
  display: flex;
}

/*Flex*/
.box{
  display: inline-flex;
}

/*Webkit-webkit*/
.box{
  display: -webkit-flex; /* Safari */
  display: flex;
}

/*Flexfloatclearvertical-align*/
```
### 
FlexFlexflex containerFlexflex item

main axiscross axismain startmain endcross startcross end

main sizecross size

### 
6

flex-direction
flex-wrap
flex-flow
justify-content
align-items
align-content

#### 3.1 flex-direction
flex-direction
``` css
.box {
  flex-direction: row | row-reverse | column | column-reverse;
}
```
4

row
row-reverse
column
column-reverse

#### 3.2 flex-wrap
flex-wrap
``` css
.box{
  flex-wrap: nowrap | wrap | wrap-reverse;
}
```


1nowrap

2wrap

3wrap-reverse

#### 3.3 flex-flow
flex-flowflex-directionflex-wraprow nowrap
``` css
.box {
  flex-flow: <flex-direction> || <flex-wrap>;
}
```
#### 3.4 justify-content
justify-content
``` css
.box {
  justify-content: flex-start | flex-end | center | space-between | space-around;
}
```
5

flex-start
flex-end
center 
space-between
space-around

#### 3.5 align-items
align-items
``` css
.box {
  align-items: flex-start | flex-end | center | baseline | stretch;
}
```
5

flex-start
flex-end
center
baseline: 
stretchauto

#### 3.6 align-content
align-content
``` css
.box {
  align-content: flex-start | flex-end | center | space-between | space-around | stretch;
}
```
6

flex-start
flex-end
center
space-between
space-around
stretch

### 
6

order
flex-grow
flex-shrink
flex-basis
flex
align-self

#### 4.1 order
order0
``` css
.item {
  order: <integer>;
}
```
#### 4.2 flex-grow
flex-grow0
``` css
.item {
  flex-grow: <number>; /* default 0 */
}
```
flex-grow1flex-grow21

#### 4.3 flex-shrink
flex-shrink1
``` css
.item {
  flex-shrink: <number>; /* default 1 */
}
```
flex-shrink1flex-shrink01



#### 4.4 flex-basis
flex-basismain sizeauto
``` css
.item {
  flex-basis: <length> | auto; /* default auto */
}
```
widthheight350px

#### 4.5 flex
flexflex-grow, flex-shrink  flex-basis0 1 auto
``` css
.item {
  flex: none | [ <'flex-grow'> <'flex-shrink'>? || <'flex-basis'> ]
}
```
auto (1 1 auto)  none (0 0 auto)



#### 4.6 align-self
align-selfalign-itemsautoalign-itemsstretch
``` css
.item {
  align-self: auto | flex-start | flex-end | center | baseline | stretch;
}
```
6autoalign-items

Post.title: create-react-app
Post._content:
reactwebpack

>1.create-react-app  npm run eject 
>2.paths  

``` js
module.exports = {
  dotenv: resolveApp('.env'),
  appBuild: resolveApp('build'),
  appPublic: resolveApp('public'),
  appHtml: resolveApp('public/index.html'),
  //--------------
  app1IndexJs: resolveApp('src/App1/index.js'),
  app2IndexJs: resolveApp('src/App2/index.js'),
  //---------------------------------------------------
  appPackageJson: resolveApp('package.json'),
  appSrc: resolveApp('src'),
  yarnLockFile: resolveApp('yarn.lock'),
  testsSetup: resolveApp('src/setupTests.js'),
  appNodeModules: resolveApp('node_modules'),
  publicUrl: getPublicUrl(resolveApp('package.json')),
  servedPath: getServedPath(resolveApp('package.json')),
};
```

>3.configwebpack.config.dev.js  

+ entry
``` js
//
entry: {
  App1: [
    require.resolve('./polyfills'),
    require.resolve('react-dev-utils/webpackHotDevClient'),
    paths.app1IndexJs,//pathspaths~
  ],
  App2: [
    require.resolve('./polyfills'),
    require.resolve('react-dev-utils/webpackHotDevClient'),
    paths.app2IndexJs,//
  ],
}
```
+ output
``` js
//~
filename: 'static/js/[name].bundle.js',
```
+ pluginsHtmlWebpackPlugin
``` js
//new  HtmlWebpackPlugin chunksentrykeyentryApp1App2chunksApp1App2
new HtmlWebpackPlugin({
  inject: true,
  chunks: ["App1"],
  template: paths.appHtml,//paths
  filename: 'App1.html',//
}),
new HtmlWebpackPlugin({
  inject: true,
  chunks: ["App2"],
  template: paths.appHtml,//publichtml
  filename: 'App2.html',//
}),
```
>4.scriptsstart.js  

```js
//
if (!checkRequiredFiles([paths.appHtml, paths.app1IndexJs, paths.app2IndexJs])) {
  process.exit(1);
}
```

npm run start App1http://localhost:3000/App1.html App2http://localhost:3000/App2.html   

>5.configwebpack.config.prod.js  

+ entry
```js
//
entry: {
  App1: [
    require.resolve('./polyfills'),
    paths.app1IndexJs,//
  ],
  App2: [
    require.resolve('./polyfills'),
    paths.app2IndexJs,//
  ],
}
```
+ pluginsHtmlWebpackPlugin
```js
//new  HtmlWebpackPlugin chunksentrykeyentryApp1App2chunksApp1App2
new HtmlWebpackPlugin({
  inject: true,
  chunks: ["App1"],
  template: paths.app1Html,
  filename: 'App1.html',
  minify: {
    removeComments: true,
    collapseWhitespace: true,
    removeRedundantAttributes: true,
    useShortDoctype: true,
    removeEmptyAttributes: true,
    removeStyleLinkTypeAttributes: true,
    keepClosingSlash: true,
    minifyJS: true,
    minifyCSS: true,
    minifyURLs: true,
  },
}),
new HtmlWebpackPlugin({
  inject: true,
  chunks: ["App2"],
  template: paths.app2Html,
  filename: 'App2.html',
  minify: {
    removeComments: true,
    collapseWhitespace: true,
    removeRedundantAttributes: true,
    useShortDoctype: true,
    removeEmptyAttributes: true,
    removeStyleLinkTypeAttributes: true,
    keepClosingSlash: true,
    minifyJS: true,
    minifyCSS: true,
    minifyURLs: true,
  },
}),
```
>6.scriptsbuild.js  

```js
//
if (!checkRequiredFiles([paths.appHtml, paths.app1IndexJs, paths.app2IndexJs])) {
  process.exit(1);
}
```

npm run buildbuild~
webpackDevServer.config.jshistoryApiFallback~~GitHubhttps://github.com/YHS2017/ReactMultiPage.git ~

reactwebpack

>1.create-react-app  npm run eject 
>2.paths  

``` js
module.exports = {
  dotenv: resolveApp('.env'),
  appBuild: resolveApp('build'),
  appPublic: resolveApp('public'),
  appHtml: resolveApp('public/index.html'),
  //--------------
  app1IndexJs: resolveApp('src/App1/index.js'),
  app2IndexJs: resolveApp('src/App2/index.js'),
  //---------------------------------------------------
  appPackageJson: resolveApp('package.json'),
  appSrc: resolveApp('src'),
  yarnLockFile: resolveApp('yarn.lock'),
  testsSetup: resolveApp('src/setupTests.js'),
  appNodeModules: resolveApp('node_modules'),
  publicUrl: getPublicUrl(resolveApp('package.json')),
  servedPath: getServedPath(resolveApp('package.json')),
};
```

>3.configwebpack.config.dev.js  

+ entry
``` js

  App1: [
    require.resolve('./polyfills'),

  App2: [
    require.resolve('./polyfills'),
```

+ output

+ pluginsHtmlWebpackPlugin

+ entry

```js
}
```
+ pluginsHtmlWebpackPlugin
```js

  inject: true,
  chunks: ["App1"],

  minify: {
    removeComments: true,
    collapseWhitespace: true,
    removeRedundantAttributes: true,
    useShortDoctype: true,
    removeEmptyAttributes: true,
    removeStyleLinkTypeAttributes: true,
    keepClosingSlash: true,

    minifyURLs: true,
  },

new HtmlWebpackPlugin({
  inject: true,
  chunks: ["App2"],
  template: paths.app2Html,
  filename: 'App2.html',
  minify: {
    removeComments: true,
    collapseWhitespace: true,
    removeRedundantAttributes: true,
    useShortDoctype: true,
    removeEmptyAttributes: true,
    removeStyleLinkTypeAttributes: true,
    keepClosingSlash: true,
```

>6.scriptsbuild.js
